skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gospel voice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Gospel Voice is the official skill for accessing content from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on Alexa devices.

Bring powerful messages of hope, love, and faith into your home as you fill your environment with music, scriptures, and the words of Prophets and Apostles. Get instant access to inspirational music from the Tabernacle Choir and Saints Channel Radio, access audio scriptures, listen to your weekly Come Follow Me lessons, and listen live or replay General Conference talks anytime. Gospel Voice is a great way to increase the spirit in your daily life and enrich your Gospel entered home.

You can send feedback to gospelvoice@churchofjesuschrist.org

If you want to know more about The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints please visit: https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/learn/about-us
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
